bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Definition of Reliability Program Plans for Nuclear Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities
Redline
IEEE Guide for the Definition of Reliability Program Plans for Nuclear Generating Stations and Other Nuclear Facilities - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 933-2013 (Revision of IEEE Std 933-1999) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Guidelines for the definition of a reliability program at nuclear generating stations andother nuclear facilities are provided. The document emphasizes reliability programs during theoperating phase of such stations; however, the general approach applies to all phases of thenuclear power generating station life cycle (e.g., design, construction, start-up, operating, anddecommissioning).

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
